sentences: Vanemad võivad tekitada suuri majanduslikke kaotusi metsades.
Elustikkeskkonnas on vanemad olulised osa ökosüsteemi tasakaalus.
translation: dark brown shiny bark beetle that damages pine stands
context: Vanemaid is the genitive plural form of 'vanema', which in Estonian refers to a type of insect - specifically the Ips sexdentatus, a dark brown shiny spruce bark beetle that causes damage to pine forests and stands. This beetle is an important species in forest ecology but can also cause significant economic losses when infestations occur.
